startingId_comment: This should not be needed - ID will be fetched automatically from ExileTools.com
sleepTreshold_comment: If there are less items than this number, Indexer will go to sleep to avoid unnecessary network traffic (default: 1000)
sleepTime_comment: How long (in seconds) should the Index sleep in case there are too few items to process (default: 10)
leagues_comment: Which leagues should be indexed, all other leagues will be ignored
